data.title: Montblanc: GPU accelerated Radio Interferometer Measurement Equations in support of Bayesian Inference for Radio Observations
data.name: montblanc
data.description: GPU-accelerated RIME implementations. An offshoot of the BIRO projects, and one of the foothills of Mt Exaflop.

evidence: "A Tensorflow implementation of the Radio Interferometry Measurement Equation" (domain-specific scientific computation, suggesting a research code developed by a specialized group).
README presents only project name, description, license, and docs, with no mention of package managers, containers, or binaries, implying use via the source repository.

The description ties the software directly to implementing a scientific measurement equation ("Radio Interferometry Measurement Equation"), indicating it is used to perform core scientific calculations.
